author: ericye
msg: scope binding should happen before switching to a different schema.

author: andyc
msg: The whole damn thing was broken. It should be fixed now.

author: andyc
msg: Turns out that simple choices also had the same problem.

author: andyc
msg: Problem with the simple content model -- it would only signal
errors in simple sequences (e.g. 'a,b') when BOTH the localpart
and URI were different instead of when EITHER the localpart or
URI were different. This bug was introduced by me (oops!) when
I updated the content models to validate against namespace
information for XML Schema. Now it's fixed.
